Carlos Gutierrez (John McInerny)'s cover of Elvis Presley and always lived the life of the great rock star as if he himself reincarnated, denying himself. Only now approaching the age Elvis was when he died and his future looks empty. An unexpected situation ends up forcing him to take care of his daughter Lisa Marie (Margarita Lopez), a little girl he hardly sees. On days when she is with Carlos experiences really be a father and Lisa Maria learns to accept it as such. But fate it presents a difficult decision: On a journey of madness and music, Carlos must choose between his dream of being Elvis and his family.
